meanings.definition: Remove or obliterate (something) by striking or crossing out.
meanings.sent1: I need to delete the wrong answer from my paper.
meanings.sent2: Please delete the extra line in the document.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally hit delete and now my whole paragraph is gone!
meanings.sent4: Her anger seemed to delete any chance of a peaceful resolution.
meanings.sent5: The eraser can delete mistakes on paper.

meanings.definition: To remove or erase (something) from a computer or electronic device.
meanings.sent1: Don't forget to delete the old files from the computer.
meanings.sent2: You can delete the email after you read it.
meanings.sent3: I tried to delete the virus, but it kept coming back!
meanings.sent4: The delete button on the keyboard is very handy.
meanings.sent5: Deleting unnecessary files can free up space on your device.
